borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning application reference: 2014/06127/FUL, allowed on Appeal with PINS reference: APP/H5390/W/15/3132124 granted 28th November 2016, for the "Redevelopment of the site comprising the erection of a part two storey, part three storey, part five storey building over two basement levels, together with the erection of a three storey (at basement, ground and first floors) building to the rear of the site; refurbishment and conversion of 53 Sinclair Road, in connection with provision of 43 residential units; retention of the 'arch' feature on Hofland Road; related landscaping and the provision of 27 car parking spaces at sub-basement level, following demolition of the existing buildings at 45 - 51 Sinclair Road." Amendments sought are the layout of the ground floor plan; removal of double doors and replacement of a window with a door to the Concierge lobby; replacement of a single door with a double door to the refuse holding area; installation of railings and a gate within the archway on Hofland Road enclosing the front garden for Unit 15.
